Elaine (Laina) Phillips, our beloved friend and colleague, passed away Thursday, July 23, 2020. Laina was a 2nd Grade teacher at South Polk Elementary and also taught 1st grade in her career with Polk County Schools.
Laina loved her students and spent many extra hours preparing instruction for them. She devoted many hours this summer redecorating and painting her classroom and furniture.
We will remember Laina for many things, but especially for her wonderful sense of humor, the way she loved her family and friends, and her amazing creative skills. The wonderful South Polk lobby bulletin boards were just one example of Laina's artistic and creative abilities.
Laina was always ready for a trip and traveled to many exciting places with her coworkers, who are all like family. Her kindness, helpfulness, and bright smile will not be forgotten. She will be missed by us all.

School is not over, it just looks very different. Thank you for all that you are doing to make sure we have students ready to learn once our doors reopen.
